code:
stateDiagram-v2
[*] --> initiated
state initiated
note right of initiated
  lcaIn.send(lca.getAddress(), amount) called
end note
initiated --> completed: send() returned successfully
initiated --> failed: send() threw an error
state completed
note right of completed
  Assets moved between LCAs
end note
completed --> [*]
state failed
note right of failed
  Send failed
end note
failed --> [*]

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Generic Diagram是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在Generic Diagram完成整个流程。
